verses.verse: The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shewed <S%H7200><s%> me, and, behold, two <S%H8147><s%> baskets <S%H1736><s%> of figs <S%H8384><s%> were set <S%H3259><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, after <S%H310><s%> that Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had carried away captive <S%H1540><s%> Jeconiah <S%H3204><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jehoiakim <S%H3079><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and the princes <S%H8269><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, with the carpenters <S%H2796><s%> and smiths <S%H4525><s%>, from Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, and had brought <S%H935><s%> them to Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

One <S%H259><s%> basket <S%H1731><s%> had very <S%H3966><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> figs <S%H8384><s%>, even like the figs <S%H8384><s%> that are first ripe <S%H1073><s%>: and the other <S%H259><s%> basket <S%H1731><s%> had very <S%H3966><s%> naughty <S%H7451><s%> figs <S%H8384><s%>, which could not be eaten <S%H398><s%>, they were so bad <S%H7455><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> unto me, What seest <S%H7200><s%> thou, Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%>? And I said <S%H559><s%>, Figs <S%H8384><s%>; the good <S%H2896><s%> figs <S%H8384><s%>, very <S%H3966><s%> good <S%H2896><s%>; and the evil <S%H7451><s%>, very <S%H3966><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>, that cannot be eaten <S%H398><s%>, they are so evil <S%H7455><s%>.
¶ Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came unto me, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; Like these good <S%H2896><s%> figs <S%H8384><s%>, so will I acknowledge <S%H5234><s%> them that are carried away captive <S%H1546><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, whom I have sent <S%H7971><s%> out of this place <S%H4725><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans <S%H3778><s%> for their good <S%H2896><s%>.

For I will set <S%H7760><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> upon them for good <S%H2896><s%>, and I will bring them again <S%H7725><s%> to this land <S%H776><s%>: and I will build <S%H1129><s%> them, and not pull them down <S%H2040><s%>; and I will plant <S%H5193><s%> them, and not pluck them up <S%H5428><s%>.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> them an heart <S%H3820><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> me, that I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%>: and they shall be my people <S%H5971><s%>, and I will be their God <S%H430><s%>: for they shall return <S%H7725><s%> unto me with their whole heart <S%H3820><s%>.

¶ And as the evil <S%H7451><s%> figs <S%H8384><s%>, which cannot be eaten <S%H398><s%>, they are so evil <S%H7455><s%>; surely thus saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, So will I give <S%H5414><s%> Zedekiah <S%H6667><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and his princes <S%H8269><s%>, and the residue <S%H7611><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, that remain <S%H7604><s%> in this land <S%H776><s%>, and them that dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>:

And I will deliver <S%H5414><s%> them to be removed <S%H2189><s%> <S%H2113><s%> into all the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> for their hurt <S%H7451><s%>, to be a reproach <S%H2781><s%> and a proverb <S%H4912><s%>, a taunt <S%H8148><s%> and a curse <S%H7045><s%>, in all places <S%H4725><s%> whither I shall drive <S%H5080><s%> them.

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>, the famine <S%H7458><s%>, and the pestilence <S%H1698><s%>, among them, till they be consumed <S%H8552><s%> from off the land <S%H127><s%> that I gave <S%H5414><s%> unto them and to their fathers <S%H1><s%>.
